intro_section.subtitle: Exceptional Flight Training
intro_section.title: The Flight Training Experts
intro_section.description: As the only flight school with a Cessna fleet in the area, we pride ourselves in training safe and highly proficient pilots. Come see what everyone's talking about! Visit Blue Skies Above and begin flight training today.

instructors_section.title: Knowledgeable Experienced Flight Instructors
instructors_section.description: Our team of highly knowledgeable and experienced flight instructors places an emphasis on safety and professional while making lessons enjoyable and fun. We aim to ensure that you not only excel as a pilot but also prioritize safety in every aspect of your flying.

stats.label: Students graduated from Blue Skies Above

benefits.title: Convenient Location
benefits.description: Just 20 minutes from Opelika, 30 minutes from Auburn, and less than an hour from Columbus.

benefits.title: Time and Money Saver
benefits.description: Closer to Opelika and Auburn than flight schools in Alexander City, LaGrange, Columbus, or Montgomery.

benefits.title: Quiet and Efficient Airport
benefits.description: Quiet airport with low traffic and no control tower. Simple ramp and short taxi times mean more flying.

benefits.title: Advanced Avionics
benefits.description: Upgraded, advanced avionics equipment with digital displays and partial glass cockpit.

benefits.title: Modern Fleet
benefits.description: Some of the newest independent flight training aircraft in the area.

benefits.title: Enhanced Performance
benefits.description: Upgraded 180hp engines provide better climb rates and quicker cruise speeds.

benefits.title: Onsite CFI Spin Endorsements
benefits.description: Spin-legal 172s allow for CFI spin endorsements onsite.

process_section.title: Become a pilot at Blue Skies Above
process_section.description: Our flight school welcomes aviators to Lanett, Alabama. The process is simple and only takes 3 steps to get started.

steps.title: 1. Meet The Team
steps.description: Get in touch with a Blue Skies Team member. We'll learn what your aviation goals are.

steps.title: 2. Visit Blue Skies Above
steps.description: Visit our flight school and see our planes. Fly with one of our CFIs.

steps.title: 3. Start Flying
steps.description: Whether you're flying for a career or flying for fun, we'll help you become a safe proficient pilot.

cta_section.title: We are the flight training experts in Lanett, AL
cta_section.subtitle: Providing pilot training to the Auburn, Columbus, Opelika, LaGrange, Montgomery areas
cta_section.description: As the only independent flight school with a Cessna fleet in the area, we pride ourselves in training safe and highly proficient pilots.
